Articles.Content: I been playing KSP for a while. But I get low FPS, 10-20 FPS. Please tell me ways to increase FPS, thanks!
Lower your graphic settings or buy a better computer.
If the lag is increasing and your graphic settings have been the same all the time, it's probably the accumulated debris. Remove it and you should see an increase in performance.

Some other things that can cause lag:

I've read of a Ocean/water graphics glitch, but the most common reason is usually too many parts being rendered with physics. Generally anything with over 500 parts will lag the game; this can be severe if you are trying to dock 2 ships with a lot of parts. This can also happen if you have a lot of ships/debris in one area (like close to the launchpad/runway.

This is one reason people try to make modular interplanetary ships/stations with as few parts as possible to avoid lag from high part counts as they assemble them.

Try this Fix: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43253-Default-Terrain-Quality-Without-most-of-The-Lag! That pretty much sums it up. KSP is a great game, but when you can play the game on the highest settings and have excellent frame rate (usually over 100 fps), it becomes an awesome game. It is much more enjoyable if you can play it without any limitations.

Honestly, if you really like KSP and are devoted (obsessed) to (with) it, then a rig built for it is way worth the investment.
